properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
CAPE VERDE.
DNC 01.
F/V CAP ATLANTIC, 30 PERSONS ON BOARD,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT IN 16-53.60N 021-52.40W
AT 051600Z MAY.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC RABAT,
PHONE: 2125 3762 5877, 2125 3762 5897,
FAX: 2125 3762 5017,
E-MAIL: MRCC.RABAT@MPM.GOV.MA,
MRCCRABAT@GMAIL.COM.
